TopicTitle: Long Night of Solace. Light cruiser.

Articles.Content:
After a kerbal mistake committed by Bob Kerman at KNP (Kerbal Nuclear Program) that put the whole planet in a nuclear winter (don't ask questions), the KSC builded a ship to escape from Kerbin with the rest of the Kerbalkind to Laythe. It's unknown the whereabouts of Valentina, Jeb and Bill. Bob died at KNP. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/n0neg)

I used tweak scale, station parts expansion and near future solar panels.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-11T00:46:34Z" title="08/11/2015 12:46  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 11, 2015</time> by Zais**
So did they make it to Laythe in that terrifying looking spacecraft?

I'm a little busy those last days, I'm planing a permanent mission to Laythe so this was just a test run to see if the ship get to orbit.

And I also think that is terrifying too.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-15T23:15:42Z" title="08/15/2015 11:15  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 15, 2015</time> by Zais**
